班拿貝朝聖指南


機票
因航會有直航機，飛大概15個鐘，我好似未見過fanfares有做過馬德里既優惠 (復活節買因航機票六千幾直飛馬德里)
中東三寶，計埋轉機至少都要19個鐘，我上次搭emirates來回大概$4xxx，飛大概20個鐘

波飛
經官網買飛最平，比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，不過有分優先次序，club member > madridista > public
班拿貝球場出面亦都有個官方櫃台可以俾你買飛，都係比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，每日都會有飛分批出售
另外官方櫃台出面都有堆人坐係度會係咁問你係咪買飛
如果係官網買唔到，可以去viagogo, stubhub度買，佢地多數可以一早買定黎緊嗰季既飛，不過通常都係炒價 （我上次係用viagogo買，睇主場對西維爾，坐係同球員通道隔一個block最前排大概$3xxx，y絲睇馬德里打吡，坐兩邊上方，近3000元。）
*注意：賽事有可能會改期，提前好多買飛既巴打自己留意

Tour Bernabéu
可以參觀班拿貝球場、皇家馬德里博物館、球員休息室、領隊座位與球員後備席
門票: €25 (手持Madridista: €17)
開放時間：10:00-19:30 (星期一及星期六)、10:30-18:30 (星期日及假期)
*注意：比賽日開放時間會提早結束，有d地方唔會開放，巴打自己留意

Madridista
即場做madridista有優惠，平過上網申請
另外球場入面間Adidas madridista有95折，ultra boost嗰啲鞋都照樣有折

交通
去班拿貝球場好方便，metro直頭有個班拿貝站，班拿貝站係深藍色10號線，車站兩個出口都係一抬頭就見到球場
開波前一個鐘左右就入得場

以上資訊由duckyea!、潺仔、Y_nada_mas、🔥卻老提供

拉莫斯600場：我撐VAR！

【now.com體育】皇家馬德里隊長沙治奧拉莫斯第600次為球隊上陣，賽後表示支持使用VAR，原因當然與對手的入球被VAR所取消有關。

皇家馬德里在周三歐聯16強首回合以2:1擊敗阿積士，對方後衛達利亞費高37分鐘曾頂入領先，但卻經VAR判決下指其侵犯門將在先而無效。結果皇馬以2:1擊敗阿積士，隊長沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）賽後贊成使用VAR，皆因球隊從中獲得利益。

「我説過很多次，我十分贊成使用VAR，因它漸漸令足球變得更公平。」沙治奧拉莫斯說。這位球星第600次替球隊上陣，成為隊史第7人達此里程碑，他於90分鐘卻故意侵犯對手領黃牌，累積足夠黃牌將缺席次回合賽事，賽後被批評故意「洗白」，以確保8強可上陣。

「很可惜次回合不能披甲。我希望更多替皇馬上陣，續以隊長身份帶領球隊。」拉莫斯說。皇馬將於3月6日的次回合主場對阿積士，屆時拉莫斯將作為座上客。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

阿積士入球被吹走 網民諷VAR偏幫皇馬

今晨阿積士對皇家馬德里一場歐聯16強中，前者於37分鐘的入球被球證引用VAR後判為無效。不少網民認為阿積士的入球屬合法，故諷刺皇馬從VAR中得益，更指該技術的全名應寫成Video Assisting Real Madrid。

阿積士今晨有達利亞費高在37分鐘憑一次角球攻勢引發的混戰中頂入皇馬大門，惟球證引用VAR後認為門將高圖爾斯被處於越位置杜辛泰迪治阻礙在先，結果判入球無效。這個經使用VAR的判決惹來不少爭議，有不少網民認為今次VAR判決明顯偏幫皇馬，更有人在twitter上指出VAR（Video Assisting Referee）的正名應為Video Assisting Real Madrid。（Goal.com）

Modric: Ajax deal for future Real Madrid star scuppered by Arsenal

Ballon d'Or winner-to-be Luka Modric was about to join Ajax from Dinamo Zagreb in summer 2007, only for Arsenal to step in...

Arsenal Eduardo move scuppers Modric Ajax switch

At the time, he was a 21-year-old making a name for himself at Dinamo Zagreb, where his style of play - which did not take long to draw comparisons with Ajax great Johan Cruyff - quickly attracted the attention of the Eredivisie club. Sporting director Martin van Geel flew to Croatia to seal a deal for the midfielder, only for it to fall through at the 11th hour, because of... Arsenal.

Curiously, Modric would end up going to North London, but to join arch rivals Tottenham. Getting back to summer 2007, though: it was the Gunners who scotched his hopes of playing at Ajax. When they submitted an unexpected offer for his club-mate Eduardo da Silva, the striker moved to the Emirates Stadium in a 17m-euro deal that brought a much-needed injection of cash into Dinamo's bare coffers, and allowed the Croats to pull the plug on selling Modric.

"Ajax wanted Modric and he wanted to go"

The magazine Panorama has this week revealed details of the backstory to Ajax's failed pursuit of a footballer who was eager to pull on the red and white shirt. "Luka was dubbed the 'little Cruyff' in Croatia, and he'd ask me about Ajax all the time," explained former international team-mate Joey Didulica, who spent four years at the 33-time Dutch champions between 1999 and 2003. "He wanted to know everything he could about the club," said Didulica, who was sure to make Ajax aware of this. "They wanted him and he wanted to go, but it wasn't to be."

The fine performances that Modric would subsequently deliver in the Champions League - of which one, much to Ajax's chagrin, came in Amsterdam - merely served to push his value through the roof, and out of the club's reach. In a 21m-euro transfer the following year, Spurs finally secured the services of a man who would go on to be a Ballon d'Or winner at the Bernabéu.

Tite sends his son to spy on Vinicius on unplanned trip


The Brazilian assistant, Mateus Bachi, and fitness coach, Fábio Mahseredjian, will travel to Madrd to watch Vinicius and Real Madrid play Girona on Sunday.

Vinicius' exlosion mixed with Neymar's recent injury has changed the course of Brazil's national team. Tite has decided to send scouts including Mateus Bacho, his son, and his fitness coach to watch Real Madrid play Girona next Sunday at the Bernabéu.

The objective is not a secret. It is to follow the development of the young star as he continues to earn plaudits with his displays in white.

It will be the second time a member of Brazil's back-room staff has watched the 18-year-old. Another assistent, former Barcelona full-back Sylvinho, was sent to the Clásico in the Copa del Rey to watch the teenager.

Ajax 1-2 Real Madrid: Tagliafico goal rightly ruled out, says AS ref


Former FIFA official Eduardo Iturralde González says the decision to chalk off a first-half Ajax goal after a VAR review was the correct one.

Damir Skomina was right to rule out Nicolás Tagliafico's goal for hosts Ajax in Wednesday's Champions League last-16 first leg with Real Madrid, says AS' resident referee.

Tagliafico header disallowed after video review

Tagliafico's header shortly before half time was chalked off when, after re-watching the incident as part of a VAR review, referee Skomina deemed Dusan Tadic to have been interfering with play from an offside position.

The VAR (video assistant referee) system is making its Champions League debut in the knockout rounds of this season's tournament.

Tadic impedes Courtois from offside position, says AS ref
Tadic, who was standing just in front of Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois when Tagliafico headed towards goal, was correctly ruled to have been in an illegal position, says former FIFA official Eduardo Iturralde González.

"He's influencing the play," Iturralde González said. "The keeper can't challenge for the ball because of him."

replies.msg:
'Big clubs' more likely to benefit from VAR, says Ajax' De Jong


Frenkie de Jong felt frustrated by the VAR call that denied Ajax an opening goal against Real Madrid, but he remains proud of his team.

Ajax midfielder Frenkie de Jong suggested VAR is more likely to favour a "big club" in the wake of his side's controversial 2-1 Champions League defeat to Real Madrid on Wednesday.

FaVARs for the big boys

Second-half goals from Karim Benzema and Marco Asensio gave holders Madrid a last-16 first-leg victory at Johan Cruijff ArenA, despite Hakim Ziyech having given the home side some hope.

Nicolas Tagliafico had a goal disallowed in the first half following a VAR review, with referee Damir Skomina penalising Dusan Tadic for interfering with Madrid goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois while in an offside position.

De Jong, who is to join LaLiga champions Barcelona in July in an €86million deal, thinks such decisions will usually go in favour of the major sides.

"We did well as a team. It's a shame our goal was disallowed. Maybe something like that is easy to do in favour of a big club. We've had that as well," he told NOS.

"But we carried on well and we had our chances afterwards. It's too bad it didn't get us a better result.

"In Spain, we have to play the same way we did at home, with bravery and conviction. Nothing has been decided yet. Real will feel more pressure in front of their own fans."

Ziyech, who had equalised with 15 minutes of normal time left only to see Asensio snatch a late winner midweek, insists Ajax can go to the Santiago Bernabeu for the return leg without fear.

"We can be proud of the team," he said. "We fought for each other. It's disappointing to give it away in the last few minutes.

"If we play with the same attitude, the same guts, then we don't have to be afraid of the Bernabeu."

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/14/football/1550133649_770411.html

巴西主帥派兒子考核雲尼斯奧斯

【now.com體育】巴西國家隊主帥泰迪決定派出兒子馬迪奧斯和體能教練法比奧，於下周日到班拿貝球場，盼透過皇家馬德里對基羅納的比賽觀察新星雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞的狀況。

皇家馬德里的巴西新星雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞最近表現大爆發，加上巴西主將尼馬最近受傷倦勤，令巴西國家隊的陣容出現變數，巴西主帥泰迪（Tite）派出密探觀察球員的表現。

這將是巴西工作人員第2次觀察這位18歲新星的表現，另一位助教、前巴塞隆拿後衛施雲奴，之前亦被派到觀賞西班牙國王盃皇馬對巴塞隆拿大戰，以觀察雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞的狀態。

據了解，泰迪與他的工作人員自2月初以來一直在歐洲四處游走，為3月23日和3月26日分別對巴拿馬和捷克的友誼賽揀兵，更重要的是為6月14日至7月7日於巴西舉行的美洲國家盃作出部署。

雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞在皇馬正選位置漸穩，周三正選協助球隊於歐聯以2:1作客反勝阿積士。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

What the rule book says about Bale's gesture against Atlético


The sanction could be up to 12 games for Gareth Bale after his gesture to Atlético fans after LaLiga reproted him to Spanish football's competition committee.

Gareth Bale could be banned from anywhere between one and 12 games after LaLiga reported the Real Madrid player to Spanish football's Competition Committee for a gesture to Atlético Madrid fans at the Wanda Metropolitano last Saturday.


These are the four articles in the rulebook that they could invoke when studying the case:

Article 93. Public Provocation. This article states that "provoking the animosity of the public" could face between a four and 12 game ban.

Article 100. Serious unsporting conduct. This article says Bale could see a suspension between four and 10 games along with a fine if the conduct is seen as unsporting and if it considered serious.

Article 121. Provoking the public. "Provoking the animosity of the public without achieving its objective will see one sanctioned for between one and three games or for a time period up to a month."

Article 122. Unsporting conduct. This is the same as article 100 which could see a fine of €602 and a ban of up to four games for such behaviour that is deemed mild.

慶祝手勢出事！巴利或面臨停賽12場？

【now.com體育】英媒報道，加里夫巴利因一個入球慶祝手勢，令西甲賽會已促請西班牙足總對其作出懲罰，該皇家馬德里球星或需面臨停賽12場的處分。

早前於對馬德里體育會的西甲馬德里打吡中，加里夫巴利（Gareth Bale）為皇家馬德里攻入是役的第3球，而這亦是其在皇馬的第100個入球，入球後，巴利做出了一個類似「超人變身」的慶祝手勢，想不到，這個手勢可能會引致他面臨重罰。

西甲賽會就巴利的手勢發出了以下聲明：「在慶祝入球時，巴利揮動其右臂到他的頭部附近，可預期那是一個挑釁公眾的動作，他隨後更做出疑似淫穢和輕蔑的舉動，抬起彎曲的手臂，並以另一隻手擊打手臂的中間位置，這些挑釁行為罰則可能各有不同，如發生了這種情況，冒犯者會被罰停賽4到12場，如對公眾帶有敵意，罰則將會介乎停賽3場到停賽1個月。」

英國傳媒估計，巴利做出如此慶祝動作，被罰停賽將會在所難免，但估計會較大機會被罰停賽3場，而不會被重罰停賽12場或1個月。西甲最近宣佈，將會打擊被視為冒犯性的入球慶祝動作，巴利這次一時的樂極忘形，看來將會成為首位被罰的球員。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

高圖爾斯：想「老友」夏薩特過皇馬

泰拔高圖爾斯希望比利時同胞兼前車路士隊友夏薩特可以過檔皇家馬德里。

夏薩特不時跟皇馬扯上關係，現時效力「銀河艦隊」的高圖爾斯表示：「他過來當然好，不過我不可說太多。這是他自己要下的決定，皇馬也要決定是否想要夏薩特。不過，夏薩特是頂級球員，亦是我的好友，如果他來就好玩了，不過他要下決定。我不干涉他這件事。看看球季尾會如何吧。」

夏薩特早前透露自己已為下一步下了決定。(Goal.com)

Real Madrid: Asensio sends Solari a timely reminder


The Spain international has not been first choice under the Argentinean but used his 18 minutes to score the winner from a team-high five shots.

Marco Asensio grew up between the Netherlands and Spain, his late mother having been Dutch, and dreamed as a kid of playing in the Johan Cruyff Arena, a goal that was made reality on Wednesday when he rescued Real Madrid against Ajax in the Champions League.

The Spain international - who has found playing time difficult to come by under Santiago Solari and with the emergence of Vinicius as a regular starter under the Argentinean - took full advantage of the 18 minutes handed to him in Amsterdam and was a livewire until he finally bagged the decisive goal four minutes from time with the instinct of a number nine.

拉莫斯認末段領黃「身不由己」

【now.com體育】周三歐聯對阿積士，皇家馬德里隊長沙治奧拉莫斯自認，末段領黃牌是「身不由己」。

歐聯16強首回合，皇家馬德里險勝阿積士2:1，沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）比賽末段技術性犯規，被罰黃牌，導致次回合坐波監。「當時只是領先2:1，如果我說不是被逼犯規，我就講大話。」拉莫斯被問到是否刻意領黃牌，從而在8強前洗底說出真話：「那是當時的想法，不怕一萬，最怕萬一。」

「阿積士不斷進行前場壓迫，我們很難向前傳，只能作出長傳。」這位皇馬隊長踢法狠辣，從來不是善男信女，「足球不是永遠都踢得漂亮，我們有時要懂得如何干擾比賽，正如我們之前所料，這是一場非常難踢的比賽，對手坐擁很多年輕球員，活力充沛，幸好最終也能取得優勢。」

拉莫斯故意領黃牌或遭加監

【now.com體育】就皇家馬德里名將沙治奧拉莫斯疑似故意在周中比賽領黃牌一事，歐洲足協已表態徹查，一旦證實，拉莫斯面臨多停賽1場的處分。

周三歐聯16強首回合，皇家馬德里險勝阿積士2:1，守將沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）比賽末段技術性犯規，被罰黃牌，導致次回合坐波監，此舉被指故意。歐洲足協周四指出，已就拉莫斯的行為「展開紀律調查。」

拉莫斯較早前被問到是否刻意領黃牌，從而在8強賽事前洗底時，打開天窗說亮話，直認是「身不由己」：「當時只是領先2:1，如果我說不是被逼犯規，我就講大話。」

根據規定，如果歐洲足協查證後確認拉莫斯故意領黃牌，則該位代表皇馬出賽600場的西班牙悍將，會面臨多停賽1場的處分，若如此可說得不償失。

Real Madrid's Bale useful as impact sub... and not much more


Gareth Bale again disappointed as a starter in the win over Ajax, and recent games suggest Madrid are better off using him off the bench.

Gareth Bale again failed to grasp his opportunity in Real Madrid's Champions League win at Ajax. For the second time in the last six games, the Welshman began on the right of the front three alongside Vinicius and Karim Benzema... and for the second time in the last six games, he was hauled off after an hour: against Alavés in LaLiga earlier this month, he got 63 minutes; on Wednesday night, he got 61. In both cases, he left the field after performing poorly, having scarcely caused the opposition backline any trouble and been guilty of looseness in defence.

In Amsterdam, the 29-year-old sent three shots on goal - all efforts from distance that posed little threat - completed 20 passes out of 28 (71%), gave away possession 13 times, and won it back on four occasions. He did at least show greater commitment to his defensive duties than usual, winning 13 of his individual duels, but he was just a dead end going forward, particularly when compared to Vinicius, who was a nightmare for the Ajax defence and single-handedly created the holders' equaliser, scored by Benzema. When a clearly less-than-impressed Santiago Solari responded by replacing him with Lucas Vázquez, Madrid improved noticeably.

Gravesen: knocking out Ronaldo's tooth, rocket fight with Rooney...


In his book 'Mad Dog Gravesen: The Last of the Modern Footballing Mavericks' the man who shared a dressing room with Beckham, Figo and Raúl tells all.

Knocking Ronaldo's tooth out

At the time, the Brazilian was seen as the best forward in the world and Real Madrid had invested a whole lot in bringing him as a Galáctico. Gravesen's no nonsense style wasn't only witnessed by opposition players at the weekend: training sessions for the Dane also carried his bite. And his exuberant approach had him lifting up and hugging fellow players, one time he ruffed up the goal-machine that was Ronaldo throwing him to the ground and leaving him with one tooth less. That made some headlines in Spain!

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/15/football/1550225203_236871.html?autoplay=1

Toshack: "Bale should learn to speak Spanish as a mark of respect"

The Welsh coach spoke on the El Transistor de Onda Cero radio show offering in-depth analysis on the player he capped for Wales as a 17-year-old.

John Toshack was the guest on the late night radio show El Transistor on the Onda Cero where he spoke in depth about Real Madrid's Gareth Bale. Toshack was the Wales national team boss who gave the then 17-year-old Gareth Bale his international debut in the national team and has been following the player's progression in detail.

Bale and injuries: "Many of his injuries are based on strange gestures".

He doesn't speak Spanish: "When you move to a foreign team and out of respect for the fans, one needs to make an effort to speak the language in question. Bale needs to make an effort".

Bale's career hampered by injury: "It's true that Bale is an exceptionally talented player but injuries have certainly taken their toll".

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/15/football/1550226554_883214.html

Solari at half-time: We're letting them s**t on us and we can't allow that


Real Madridemerged victorious from the Johan Cruyff Arena after a game in which they suffered greatly in the first half and then improved massively in the second 45 minutes.

"We're letting them s**t on us and we can't allow that," the Argentine began, raising his tone in an energetic address after watching Ajax be the better side in the opening half.

"We can't play with two or three senses; we have to play with five and look inside for the sixth.

"There are times when we play the game with intent but tonight, we also have to answer back with bite."

https://www.marca.com/en/football/real-madrid/2019/02/14/5c657bc8e5fdeaf64f8b45c8.html

LaLiga: Mariano absent as Real Madrid prepare for Girona clash

The striker was unable to train with the Real Madrid group due to ongoing hip problems and is a doubt for Sunday's LaLiga encounter with Girona.

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/15/videos/1550251208_808487.html?autoplay=1

Solari expected to ring in the changes for Girona visit

Santiago Solari will likely give a number of players a chance to rest after a diificult run of games and with the upcoming double-header Clásicos in mind.

After a demanding few weeks, during which Real Madrid most recently faced Atlético Madrid, Barcelona and Ajax in space of seven days, coach Santiago Solari is expected to rest a number of players for the visit of Girona on Sunday.

One certainty is that Dani Ceballos will come in for Luka Modric, who must see out one-match ban after having picked up five yellow cards.

But Ceballos is unlikely to be the only change: up front, Karim Benzema will be given rest to recover from a knock he sustained against Ajax in Amsterdam on Wednesday. The Frenchman could be directly replaced by Mariano if he has recovered from a hip problem that saw him miss training on Friday.

Although, Solari could also opt to use Asensio in a false nine role, after the Spaniard’s impressive performance off the bench against Ajax, in which he scored Madrid’s second goal to see off the Dutch champions.

Another attacking player expected to return to the starting eleven is Lucas Vazquez, who played 30 minutes off the bench in Amsterdam.

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/15/football/1550250882_778877.html?autoplay=1

Real Madrid: Júnior Firpo injuries threaten to scupper interest


Madrid have been tipped to pay his buy-out, but having again been ruled out with a thigh issue, the wing-back's injuries are proving a concern.

Real Betis' Europa League last-32 tie against Rennes last night was less than half an hour old when Júnior Firpo pulled up with a thigh issue and had to be stretchered off at Roazhon Park. The early indications are that the 22-year-old, who had only returned to fitness a few weeks ago, has the same muscle injury that he suffered in mid-December, and can expect to miss at least another month.

As AS previously revealed, Firpo is very highly rated at the Bernabéu; however, his not infrequent injuries (he has now picked up four of some significance in the past year and a half) could well have a damaging effect on his prospects of pulling on the white shirt. Now into his second lay-off this term, he spent several weeks on the sidelines last season ahead of his first-team debut in February 2018, before also sitting out the closing stages of the campaign with a knee injury.

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/15/football/1550252005_181402.html

拉莫斯為受查驚訝

【now.com體育】沙治奧拉莫斯為領黃牌事件受徹查感到驚訝。

32歲的沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）重申周中歐聯對阿積士所領獲的黃牌，是身不由己：「我沒選擇餘地，那是在88分鐘一次非常危險的反擊，而比賽形勢均等。」

他續解說：「這解釋為我說如果不清楚領牌後會停賽是騙人，正如我知沒選擇而去犯規。而這是我所指在足球，你得作出困難的選擇。」

周三歐聯16強首回合，皇家馬德里險勝阿積士2:1，拉莫斯於比賽末段技術性犯規，被罰黃牌，導致次回合坐波監，此舉被指故意。歐洲足協周四指出已就拉莫斯的行為「展開紀律調查。」

根據規定，如果歐洲足協查證後確認拉莫斯故意領黃牌，則該位代表皇馬出賽600場的西班牙悍將，會面臨多停賽1場的處分。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

Solari gives up on Isco as a lost cause


The Argentine coach feels the situation with the player is "irreversible" and has coincided with the explosion of Vinicius and ongoing positive form from Lucas Vázquez.

Since his presentation in November 2018 as Real Madrid head coach, Santiago Solari has managed to deal with all obstacles that have appeared before him apart from one... the ongoing situation involving Isco Alarcon. Things started to turn sour between both individuals at Ipurua with the player apparently making an unpleasant gesture Solari's way upon being substituted in a game which home side Eibar eventually won 3-0. For the next game against Roma in the Champions League, Solari failed to select the player for the squad with Isco forced to watch the action from the stand. This was the tipping point and since then the relationship between coach and player has reached a deadlock with the Argentine coach now realising that the situation is irreversible and doubting that the Benalmadena born player will deliver under his tutelage.

https://en.as.com/en/2019/02/16/football/1550308845_040008.html

【now.com體育】英媒報道加里夫巴利將會在求婚成功的島嶼舉行婚禮，但為安全計，將會聘請武裝警衛。

現年29歲效力皇家馬德里的加里夫巴利，一直盛傳將與青梅竹馬的女友Emma Rhys-Jones在今年內結婚，據英國《太陽報》報道，巴利去年原本決定在城堡舉行婚禮，但現時已改變主意，將地點改為其求婚的私人島嶼上。

但由於一對新人對保安問題非常關注，擔心自身安全，因此消息人士指，巴利已經聘用了前SAS士兵來保護這個每小時500鎊租金的島嶼，並只會邀請150位來賓來參加他們的婚禮。

巴利與艾瑪早已育有3名仔女，並一起住在馬德里。婚禮除了在島嶼舉行外，兩者均希望在威爾斯舉行一次派對。有指巴利和艾瑪早在2013年已打算結婚，但因後者欲等其父親出獄後才成婚，因此一直拖延婚期。巴利外父馬田懷斯鍾斯因5年前在美國被控幕後操控股票市場及造市，被判監6年。

蘇拿利怪記者跣拉莫斯

【now.com體育】皇家馬德里中堅沙治奧拉莫斯早前自爆故意領黃牌以「洗底」，引起軒然大波，教練蘇拿利就為他澄清，指這名隊長被記者的蠱惑問題連累。

沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）在周中歐聯帶領皇家馬德里作客以2:1絕殺阿積士，於89分鐘被球證罰黃牌；他賽後承認是故意領黃牌，希望在8強前「洗底」，引發歐洲足協就此事展開調查。

拉莫斯其後澄清自己是故意犯規，不是故意領黃牌。蘇拿利也為其解畫：「根據他的說話，他表明只是故意犯規。他被問了一個很狡猾的問題，你們記者自有方法。無論如何，他已經解釋了。」

另外，新星前鋒雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞近期上位，蘇拿利認為他的成功，有賴陣中前輩的照顧：「他很年輕，我們近月都看到他的進步。不僅在比賽，他在操練時也獲得很多幫助，隊友給予他很多意見。」

高圖爾斯爆巴利係孤獨精

【now.com體育】雖然已經效力6年，但加里夫巴利仍然未能融入皇家馬德里的生活，就連球員間的聚會也鮮有出席。

門將泰拔高圖爾斯今季從車路士以3500萬鎊回歸西甲，加盟皇家馬德里。最近受訪時，他就一一點評新隊友，以領袖形容中堅沙治奧拉莫斯，以天才形容中場莫迪歷，以森巴形容左閘馬些路。

至於翼鋒加里夫巴利（Gareth Bale），高圖爾斯就說是高爾夫球手：「很難用一個詞語去形容他，他天才橫溢，但一直未能好好發揮。」

高圖爾斯雖然是比利時人，但表現自己就像在馬德里出生及成長的當地人，食和睡都很晚，巴利卻不是：「有一晚，我們整隊外出吃晚飯，但巴利及卻奧斯沒有來，指晚飯時間太遲。我們在9點半在餐廳會合，但巴利說11點就要睡覺。」

西文嘞嘞聲！雲尼斯奧斯叻過巴利

【now.com體育】皇家馬德里新星雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞成功上位，原來他在場外同樣努力，短短日子已經說得一口流利的西班牙文。

雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞（Vinicius）在2017年已經跟皇家馬德里簽下合約，但到2018年滿18歲才正式以4600萬歐元加盟。根據西班牙《阿斯報》透露，他確定轉會後，於巴西早已找來老師學習西班牙文，在登陸班拿貝後亦持續上堂。

因此，雲尼斯奧斯於西甲征戰了不足1季，已經不時能夠在訪問時以西班牙文對答。對比起於2013年加盟後，西班牙文仍然屬有限公司的翼鋒加里夫巴利，雲尼斯奧斯對皇馬的高投入程度，實在更惹人喜愛。

事實上，雲尼斯奧斯最近已完全壓倒巴利，成為教練蘇拿利的正選翼鋒，他今季在各項賽事上陣23場，取得4個入球、6次助攻，周日西甲主場迎戰基羅納，很大機會再次擔正。

泰晤士報：皇馬放棄收購夏薩特，今夏簽尼馬

尼馬自於山度士出道以來，與皇馬的轉會傳聞絶非新鮮事。不過，今次發出消息的是《泰晤士報》，內容格外受到重視。

《泰晤士報》今日 (2月17日) 報道，皇馬決定把今年夏季的簽約目標鎖定為巴黎聖日耳門的首席球星尼馬。銀河艦隊很有信心可以獲得尼馬的同意，報道指皇馬方面得到了尼馬的「鼓勵」，準備開出超過2,500萬鎊的稅後年薪作為回報。

皇馬認為巴黎聖日耳門為勢所逼，不得不放人。由於被歐洲足協重新調查違反財政公平競技法案，這間法甲豪門正承受巨大壓力，要在轉會市場變賣資產，同時減輕球員薪酬開支，放走尼馬可令球會的財政狀況大為改善，而不用影響陣中其他成員。

其次，當初尼馬毅然離開巴塞，很大程度是因為不想長期屈居於美斯之下，但聖日耳門今季正式買斷了麥巴比，這名後起之秀聲譽與日俱增，被視為未來的全球獎得主。近期尼馬受傷缺陣，麥巴比躍居法甲射手榜首位，帶領球隊遙遙領先一眾聯賽對手，也令貴為上季法甲最佳球員的尼馬感覺不是味兒。巴黎聖日耳門現在認為，尼馬離隊將有助麥巴比進一步鞏固地位。

皇馬簽尼馬將意味他們不會爭奪夏薩特，《泰晤士報》指出，簽下尼馬所涉及的巨大支出，大大減低了皇馬能夠符合車路士索價要求的可能性。

夏薩特在今季初曾暗示對轉投皇馬感到興趣，但他一直很小心，沒有排除未來繼續留效車路士的機會，他最近在法國電視台的專訪中表示，對自己在下季的前景已有了決定，但始終未有透露是去是留。

夏薩特現時與車路士的合約將於明年6月30日屆滿。

《泰晤士報》今日 (2月17日) 報道，皇馬決定把今年夏季的簽約目標鎖定為巴黎聖日耳門的首席球星尼馬。銀河艦隊很有信心可以獲得尼馬的同意，報道指皇馬方面得到了尼馬的「鼓勵」，準備開出超過2,500萬鎊的稅後年薪作為回報。

皇馬認為巴黎聖日耳門為勢所逼，不得不放人。由於被歐洲足協重新調查違反財政公平競技法案，這間法甲豪門正承受巨大壓力，要在轉會市場變賣資產，同時減輕球員薪酬開支，放走尼馬可令球會的財政狀況大為改善，而不用影響陣中其他成員。

其次，當初尼馬毅然離開巴塞，很大程度是因為不想長期屈居於美斯之下，但聖日耳門今季正式買斷了麥巴比，這名後起之秀聲譽與日俱增，被視為未來的全球獎得主。近期尼馬受傷缺陣，麥巴比躍居法甲射手榜首位，帶領球隊遙遙領先一眾聯賽對手，也令貴為上季法甲最佳球員的尼馬感覺不是味兒。巴黎聖日耳門現在認為，尼馬離隊將有助麥巴比進一步鞏固地位。

皇馬簽尼馬將意味他們不會爭奪夏薩特，《泰晤士報》指出，簽下尼馬所涉及的巨大支出，大大減低了皇馬能夠符合車路士索價要求的可能性。

夏薩特在今季初曾暗示對轉投皇馬感到興趣，但他一直很小心，沒有排除未來繼續留效車路士的機會，他最近在法國電視台的專訪中表示，對自己在下季的前景已有了決定，但始終未有透露是去是留。

夏薩特現時與車路士的合約將於明年6月30日屆滿。

里程碑！賓施馬解鎖西甲300場成就

直播吧2月17日訊 在皇家馬德里與赫羅納的比賽正在進行當中，今場比賽正選登場的賓施馬也完成了職業生涯的一大里程碑：法國人完成了自己的第300場西甲聯賽。

賓施馬也憑此成為繼基沙文之後第二位在西甲聯賽中出場超過300次的法國球員，基沙文目前在西甲中已經出場308次。

賓施馬在2009年夏天以3150萬英鎊的身價從里昂加盟皇馬，在過去有出場的299場西甲聯賽中，賓施馬一共為皇馬攻入137粒入球，並收穫83次助攻，為白衣軍團創造了220粒入球。

Sergio Ramos sets new LaLiga red card record, and will miss Levante game

Ramos was shown two yellow cards against Girona which means he is suspended for next weekend's game at Levante. He has been sent off 25 times in his career.

Sergio Ramos went into the book twice in this afternoon's game against Girona which means that he is automatically suspended for next Sunday's away game at Levante and will still be one yellow card away from another suspension when Real Madrid take on Barcelona in El Clásico on 2 March. The Madrid captain was shown his first yellow card against Girona for handball on minute 63, then was booked again on 89 for kicking Pedro Alcalá in the face whilst attempting an overhead kick. Ramos must serve the corresponding one-match suspension in LaLiga which means he will sit out the Levante game.

Prior to this afternoon's game, Ramos was on four yellow cards - he was booked in the matches against Atlético, Villarreal, Betis and Espanyol. The Levante game will be the first game he has missed this season.

【資料庫】拉莫斯領紅25次西甲最多

【now.com體育】皇馬被基羅納反勝一役，領紅的沙治奧拉莫斯延續其不光輝的歷史，繼續成為西甲領紅最多球員。

沙治奧拉莫斯（Sergio Ramos）對陣基羅納時，先是在63分鐘因手球領黃，再於89分鐘舉腳過高，兩黃一紅被逐。這是該名守將職業生涯中第25次領紅，亦是他在西甲生涯中的第20面紅牌。

這面紅牌令拉莫斯需於對陣利雲特一役停賽。鑑於他在對陣馬體會、維拉利爾、貝迪斯與及愛斯賓奴都有領黃，累積黃牌數已達4張，只要「再下一城」再次領黃，即要面對另一次停賽，不過現階段不影響這位戰將於國王盃及聯賽連戰巴塞的機會。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

蘇拿利：爭標未玩完

【now.com體育】雖然皇家馬德里在周日西甲敗陣，不過教練蘇拿利尚未為爭奪冠軍投降。

蘇拿利在球隊周日以1:2受挫於基羅納後，否認放棄爭奪西甲冠軍：「這是遺憾，我們失分而對手（巴塞隆拿）贏波，這是可惜的，因為我們之前順景。聯賽是否已玩完？不是。聯賽從來優先，我們必須盡快站起來，保持爭奪錦標，我們在3個賽事的機會猶在。」經過周日敗仗後，皇馬已落後榜首巴塞隆拿9分之多，而少排第2的馬德里體育會2分。

皇馬是役憑卡斯米路的入球領先半場，但下半場形勢逆轉，先被史杜安尼主射12碼中鵠追成平手，及至74分鐘，伏兵門前的樸度無人看管下飛身頭槌入波，令客隊反勝2:1。

被問到是否後防漏洞致輸波，蘇拿利認為不是個別球員責任，他續說：「足球是集體運動，所有球員足跡滿全場。」

圖片來源 : ©AFP

Is Kylian Mbappé eyeing up the Clásico double-header?

The French superstar may be strutting his stuff for PSG right now, but this photo shows that Kylian also keeps himself up to date with other games.

Mbappé eyes up Barça fixtures

The 20-year old will be more than aware that Real Madrid and Barcelona are facing each other twice in quick succession, and possibly was looking to clear his own schedule to see them. The photo that was captured shows the PSG star checking out the upcoming fixtures for Barça on his mobile, with the Clásicos of LaLiga and the Copa del Rey joining other domestic and European fixtures.


As Mbappé could now tell you, the Catalan side will face PSG's domestic rival Lyon in the Champions League (February 19), Sevilla in the league (February 23) and then Real Madrid in the semi-final second leg of the Copa (February 27) and in LaLiga (March 2).

Fans of Spain's big two would love nothing more than to see the World Cup winner do more than just read about fixtures in LaLiga. But not if he was pulling on the shirt of their bitter rivals.

皇馬輸波唔加操 照放2日假

【now.com體育】雖然皇家馬德里在周日西甲落敗，但教練蘇拿利未有加操，反而讓球員放2天假期。

皇家馬德里剛主場迎戰基羅納，就算有防中卡斯米路先開紀錄，但於下半場連失2球，加上隊長中堅沙治奧拉莫斯在89分鐘兩黃一紅被逐，最終以1:2落敗，跌落第3位，已落後榜首巴塞隆拿9分之多。

雖然如此，但根據《世界體育報》周一報道，蘇拿利仍然准許球員及職員在周一及二放假2天，於周二早上11時才復操，備戰下周日西甲鬥華倫西亞。蘇拿利（Santiago Solari）似乎認為，皇馬落敗主要因為最近賽程太頻繁，希望球員能夠叉叉電。

另外，翼鋒加里夫巴利在下半場後備入替，但未能在前線構成重大威脅，而且展示出來的鬥心平平；蘇拿利更被拍得於場邊，不停向這名威爾斯國腳大叫「來吧！來吧！」不太滿意其懶散態度。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

雲加爆當年拒皇馬因3件事

【now.com體育】名帥雲加執教阿仙奴22年期間，多次拒絕皇家馬德里挖角，他自爆有3大原因。

在1996年入主阿仙奴後，雲加（Arsene Wenger）向來忠心不二，他透露曾經不只一次向皇家馬德里的邀請說不：「拒絕有3個原因，我在兵工廠感覺良好，我甚球員關係好，我希望發展這裡的計劃。」

現時雲加已離開效力了22年的阿仙奴，對於將來會不會執教皇馬，他表示：「我不能回答你，因為我不知道將來會發生甚麼事。我的工作是把球員最佳一面發揮出來，希望能夠繼續這樣做，但首先我要把自己的最佳一面發揮出來，現在我正尋找最佳的方法。」

69歲的雲加早前曾稱讚皇馬是世界上最佳的球會，似乎這支西甲班霸真的有機會圓夢：「要是你問世界上任何一位領隊，有沒有興趣執教皇馬，肯定每個人都說有。」

皇馬成績差 馬些路攬晒上身

皇馬在馬些路在陣的比賽，過去9戰只得1勝，這名巴西球星在周日負基羅納後公開道歉。

皇馬左閘馬些路在個人ig上留言，回認近來的批評，並為周日負基羅納一戰的表現道歉。

有人在賽後於皇馬ig賬戶上上載一張馬些路與陣中22歲小將利古朗的比較，認為利古朗才是正選左閘人選。

皇馬在馬些路在陣時，近9戰只得1 勝，相反在利古朗在陣的9場比賽，皇馬全勝。

相片下寫道：「為何馬些路仍是正選?我喜愛他，但是時侯面對現實。希馬些路可以盡快重拾最佳狀態。 」

馬些路隨後回應，表示全都是他的錯，希望大家繼續向前。

馬些路今季在24場聯賽只上陣13次，在1月對西維爾時更因體重問題沒有被列入大軍名單。

問到皇馬教練蘇拿利馬些路表現如何，他只簡單回應「好，不錯。」

有報道指基羅納在比賽中針對馬些路進攻，但基羅納教練否認。(Goal.com)

Barca targeted Benzema before he joined Madrid

Real Madrid striker Karim Benzema was a primary transfer target for Barcelona while at Lyon back in 2008, according to Marca.

Former Blaugrana boss Pep Guardiola had lost faith in Samuel Etoo at the time and was hoping to bring in the Frenchman to replace him.

The move eventually broke down because Barca’s ex-technical secretary Txiki Begisristain was left unimpressed with Benzema’s demeanour after holding talks with the player in Lyon.

西超盃改革 國外上演4強賽

【now.com體育】西班牙足總主席魯比奧斯宣佈，西班牙超級盃將會改制為4支球隊爭奪，並將於國外舉行。

西班牙足總主席魯比奧斯（Luis Rubiales）於今天宣佈，西班牙超級盃將會於賽制及比賽地點改革。新賽制下，西超盃將會由傳統的兩隊相爭改為4支球隊參賽。

魯比奧斯於周二的記者會上說：「下一次西超盃將會在西班牙國外舉行，形式將會類似4強賽。」根據新的賽制，西甲和國王盃的冠亞軍將對賽，勝者會進入決賽，不設3、4名的排名賽，有指今年的西超盃立即以此新制舉行。

2018年時西超盃已經有所改革，由原先的兩回合改為一場過的決賽，由巴塞隆拿於摩洛哥的丹吉爾與西維爾爭奪。魯比奧斯一直希望將部份西甲比賽移至國外上演，希望可以此開拓國外更大市場，不過一直受到國內反對聲音批評。

邦路斯證曾獲皇馬斟介

【now.com體育】周三歐聯16強首回合，祖雲達斯作客馬德里體育會前，中堅邦路斯承認去年夏天曾獲皇家馬德里斟介。

意大利中堅邦路斯（Leonardo Bonucci）接受《阿斯報》訪問，透露皇馬曾出手斟介：「這是事實，皇馬對我感興趣，這是一種榮譽，證明近幾年自己保持高水準，但我渴望回到祖記懷抱，也覺得這兒更加適合我。」

邦路斯轉投AC米蘭後，今季重返祖記，直言：「我知道回來的決定會引起爭議，但我知道自己是甚麼人，我兒子更加高興，去年效力A米時，我經常不在家，兒子也是我回來的原因。」

談到今季加盟的基斯坦奴朗拿度，邦路斯開玩笑道：「他的加盟，我是不太高興，哈哈，因我記得大家仍是敵人，但這對意大利足球是好事，證明意甲能吸引巨星加盟。C朗是地上最強，他來到之後提升了球隊的層次，我們毫不掩飾想贏歐聯的野心。」

Ed Sheeran求簽皇馬

【now.com體育】如果皇家馬德里無法羅致夏薩特，可會考慮自薦的樂壇巨星Ed Sheeran？

英國創作人兼4屆格林美獎得主Ed Sheeran本身是足球迷，也是葉士域治的支持者，日前在社交網站上載短片，並留言：「皇家馬德里求求簽下我。」短片獲得超過220萬次觀看，有網民開玩笑說，不如加盟鋒線不濟的車路士。

Ed Sheeran日前身在巴西，進行個人巡演，演唱會場地的彭美拉斯主場，連續兩晚的演唱會已經售罄，日前穿起「Edinho」的球衣踢波，接應傳中時起腳，面對兩碼空門射失，令人忍俊不禁。

Ed Sheeran與當地球隊比賽，慶祝27歲生日，射入幾球，與2700萬名Ig粉絲分享點滴：「我們與巴西球員交手，表現很差，但回憶很快樂，在對手門將慷慨解囊之下，我也射入幾球，這一天真是太美妙了。」

丹尼路：哥帥施丹難比較

【now.com體育】作為前皇家馬德里後衛，曼城守將丹尼路雷斯認為哥迪奧拿和施丹無法正面比較。

巴西外援丹尼路雷斯（Danilo）效力曼城前，曾效力施丹麾下的皇馬，日前接受《鏡報》訪問時表示：「兩位主帥截然不同，同樣是頂級主帥，但無法作出正面比較。」

「很高興曾為兩人主帥效力，哥迪奧拿對細節的要求是獨一無二，施丹所獲得的成就是可圈可點，我無法說出誰比較厲害一點。」27歲的丹尼路自從2017年由皇馬加盟曼城，加盟前是西甲和歐聯冠軍，加盟後成為英超和聯賽盃冠軍。

被問到英超和西甲的不同，巴西人回應指：「英格蘭足球顯明體力化一點、更講求戰術，這是他們以這種方法爭取勝利，但對我來說，兩國聯賽同是世界最佳。坦白說，曼城渴望獲得歐聯，我們曾討論如何贏得它。」

史浩克04VS曼城
